page.title: 19Arts in Congleton
page.content: { Congleton}has a rich heritage of outlets to kindle the artistic desires of its residents. The recently opened Daneside Theatre, which is managed by a charitable trust,is in great demand by the thespian and musically inclined For instance The{Congleton}Players, The Pantomime Group, The{Congleton Entertainers, The Choral Society and both Operatic Societies.It is little wonder that a town steeped in history should have so many societies linked to the past e.g. The Family History Society, The Historic Houses and Gardens Association and The History Society.There is a Writers Workshop for budding authors and novelists, a Photographic Society and The Art Society.Covering all aspects is The Society for Music and Art.Lording it over them all is The Arts Council.
